function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Integration of knowledge to obtain the danger model","Impact":"Inaccurate danger model that does not effectively mitigate contagious disease propagation","Mitigation":"Thorough validation and verification of the knowledge integration process","Technologies":"Rule-based systems, data querying tools","People":"City planners, epidemiologists, data scientists","Owner":"City planning organizations, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Representation of the city's physical environment for navigation","Impact":"Failure to provide safe navigation service that minimizes the risk of contagion","Mitigation":"Thorough validation and verification of the representation of the city's physical environment","Technologies":"Graph-based spatial representation, data collection tools","People":"City planners, urban designers, software engineers","Owner":"City planning organizations, navigation service providers"}]}
